hackathon-description-text: The Vistara Hackathon brings India's Largest Aviation Hackathon Vistara Hackathon 2017 in partnership with IncubateIND and takes you on a new voyage of the hack with talented teams of developers, designers, and data scientists.
hackathon-requirements: Submission must be done by 12:30 Pm
hackathon-rules:
This is a team participation hackathon. There should be at least 2 members and at most 5 members in each team. Individual registrants are not considered.
You are expected to come up with new and innovative ideas, any idea that has been copied from somewhere will be disqualified.
Your hack must be developed entirely during the Hackathon duration. You may use open source libraries and other freely available systems / services such as Google Maps, Facebook Connect, Twitter feeds etc.
Once the hackathon ends, you will get an option to submit your hack - A fully working demo and Presentation (Only Pdf format) which explains - Idea & its Impact.
Teams shortlisted by the judges on the basis of their overall performance and teamwork during hackathon will proceed to the pitching round. Judges decision will be final

hackathon-prizes.prize-title: 1st Prize    - Mobile Phones  - Amazon Firestick to all members of the team  - One flight ticket of Vistara to any part of the country to each member of the winning team  - Adobe Creative Cloud Subscription for a year
2nd Prize   - Amazon Kindle to every team member  - Google Chrome Cast to each member   - Bluetooth Speakers to all members of the team
3rd Prize   - Smart Fitness Watch to each member  - Amazon Gift Vouchers  - Selfie Sticks   - T-shirts from Amadeus to all member
